prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Brass, Bass, Piano, Reed, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Guitar, Bass, Brass, and Reed, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Brass, Guitar, Piano, and Reed, but no Drums.

Style 3:
No Drums are included in this song, but it does have Bass, Brass, Guitar, Piano, and Reed.
